label: LaboratoryObservationAnalysisMethod
comment: A defined way of performing laboratory observation analysis.

objectProperties.comment: The identifier for the certificate granted to a party for this laboratory observation analysis method.
The code specifying the type of certification for this laboratory observation analysis method.
The external reference, expressed as text, for this laboratory observation analysis method.
The identifier for this laboratory observation analysis method.
Information, expressed as text, for this laboratory observation analysis method.
The code specifying the type of laboratory observation analysis method, which is the local method of the observer party for the kind of observation.
The name, expressed as text, for this laboratory observation analysis method.
The code specifying the type of analysis method obligatory for the laboratory observation.
The measure of the minimum object size required for this laboratory observation analysis method.

The code specifying the type of laboratory observation analysis method, which is the standard method of the observer party for the kind of observation, such as a Logical Observation Identifiers Names and Codes (LOINC) code and method.

referencedBy.comment: A laboratory observation analysis method used for this sample observation result.
